sect1.title: Moving files
sect1.para: Moving files: One of the (many) complaints against cvs is that it has no concept of 1) moving files or 2) versioning directories. If you need to move a file, it's generally better to do it on the server manually. The alternative is remove a file using cvs delete then add the new version in the new place with cvs add. The downside using this method is that you will lose the revision history for that file. However, moving it on the server itself won't cause a loss of revision history.
